Posts.Content: Feb 1, 2019 07:27AM Naplesali wrote: yes, you will be fine. I had a lumpectomy in Texas and flew home the next day. I had 11 lymph nodes removed and my port placed at the same time. I had to travel with a drain. Not fun, but I did it. Have a great time.
Posts.Title: Flying two days after lumpectomy Toyamjj Naplesali

Posts.Content: Nov 27, 2018 10:50AM Naplesali wrote: Hi. I also have been breaking out since starting chemo. One of the nurses mentioned it is probably from the steroids. I hate it. I also have a rash on my chest. I have just been using spot treatment on the acne and trying to keep the rest of my skin moisturized. The rash does not its when I stay on top of moisturizing. I use a sesame seed oil that works well, but the oil kind of gets everywhere. I also use a coconut body butter that works great. Hope this helps
Posts.Title: Acne During Chemo TWow11967 greenae
